roleset.name: sell off government property

example.name: typical usage
example.text: ... nor can the government easily back down on promised protection for a privatized company while it proceeds with controversial plans to denationalize most of Britain 's water and electricity industries .

propbank.arg: most of Britain 's water and electricity industries

roleset.note: DENATIONALIZE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'denationalize' based on semi-automatic expansion from 'privatize'. (from denationalize.01-v predicate notes)
